validationRules.socialIcon: Required - minimum 1 icon in array, each item needs _key
validationRules.socialIcon[].socialNtwk: Required when customType='icon' - must be valid FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fab fa-facebook-f')
validationRules.socialIcon[].customIcons: Used when customType='icon' for custom FontAwesome icons
validationRules.socialIcon[].imgField.url: Required when customType='image' - must be valid image URL
validationRules.socialIcon[].linkUrl.url: Required - destination URL for each icon
validationRules.socialIcon[].linkUrl.target: Recommended: '_blank' for external social media links
validationRules.socialIcon[]._key: Required - unique identifier for each icon in array (0, 1, 2, ...)
validationRules.style: 16 style variants available (style-1 to style-16) - each has unique hover effects
validationRules.hoverStyle: Common value: 'faded' - controls hover transition behavior
validationRules.iconSize: Recommended: 16-24px for readability, responsive breakpoints supported
validationRules.iconPadd: Padding around icon, affects clickable area - recommended 10-15px
validationRules.iconGap: Space between icons - recommended 8-15px for balanced spacing
validationRules.s3CircleWidth: Only for style-3 - defines circle diameter (40-60px typical)
validationRules.iconBRadius: Border radius - 4-8px for rounded, 50% for perfect circle
validationRules.titleTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable typography settings (style-1, style-2, style-4, style-10, style-12, style-14, style-15)
validationRules.itemTooltip: Set to true to enable tooltip for individual icon
validationRules.tooltipText: Tooltip content - keep under 50 characters for readability
validationRules.tooltipTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable tooltip typography
validationRules.tipArrow: Boolean - true shows tooltip arrow, false hides it
validationRules.nmlIcnShadow.openShadow: Must be 1 to enable box shadow (style-7, style-16)
validationRules.borderWidth: Only for style-16 when borderStyle != 'none' - 1-3px recommended

warnings: Each icon in socialIcon array MUST have unique _key (0, 1, 2, ...) - duplicate keys break rendering
customType determines which icon source is used: 'icon' uses socialNtwk/customIcons, 'image' uses imgField.url
titleTypo only works with specific styles: style-1, style-2, style-4, style-10, style-12, style-14, style-15
s3CircleWidth only applies to style-3 (circular icons) - ignored by other styles
iconWidth/iconHeight only apply to style-16 - ignored by other styles
Tooltips require itemTooltip:true AND tooltipText to display - both must be set
tipMaxWidth is a STRING number in pixels (e.g., '150' not 150) - wrong type breaks tooltips
tipDurationIn/tipDurationOut are STRING numbers in milliseconds (e.g., '300' not 300)
tipBg.bgType='gradient' requires full bgGradient object with color1, color2, type, direction
External links (social media) should use target:'_blank' for better UX
nofollow attribute: set to 'nofollow' for paid/untrusted links, empty '' for your own profiles
FontAwesome icons require correct class prefix: 'fab' (brands), 'fas' (solid), 'far' (regular)
nmlIcnShadow/hvrIcnShadow only work with style-7 and style-16 - ignored by other styles
borderStyle/borderWidth only work with style-16 - ignored by other styles
Max 20 social icons recommended for performance - more may slow page load
Always test responsive breakpoints (md/sm/xs) - alignment and sizing should adapt gracefully
commonMistakes: Forgetting _key in socialIcon array items - causes React rendering errors
Using number instead of string for tipMaxWidth/tipDurationIn/tipDurationOut
Setting customType='image' but forgetting imgField.url - icon won't display
Enabling titleTypo on incompatible style variants - typography won't apply
Setting itemTooltip:true without tooltipText - empty tooltip shows
Not setting openTypography:1 before configuring titleTypo or tooltipTypo
Using px units for icon sizes on mobile - rem/em scale better
Forgetting target:'_blank' for external social links - poor UX
Inconsistent _key numbering (e.g., 0, 2, 5 instead of 0, 1, 2) - not technically wrong but confusing
Copying socialNtwk FontAwesome classes incorrectly - must include prefix (fab/fas/far)
Setting openShadow:1 for nmlIcnShadow on non-style-7/16 blocks - shadow won't render
Using borderStyle without borderWidth on style-16 - border invisible
Not testing tooltip placement on mobile - 'top' might go offscreen
Over-styling tooltips with too much shadow/padding - looks heavy
Using too many icons (20+) without lazy loading - page performance degrades
bestPractices: **Brand Colors:** Use official brand colors for each network (Facebook: #3b5998, Twitter: #1da1f2, Instagram: #e4405f, LinkedIn: #0077b5, YouTube: #FF0000, Pinterest: #bd081c)
**Consistent Sizing:** Keep iconSize consistent across all icons in the same block for visual harmony
**Hover Feedback:** Always provide hover state changes (hvrBG different from nmlBG) for better UX
**External Links:** Use target:'_blank' for all social media links to open in new tab
**Accessibility:** Provide meaningful title attributes for screen readers ('Facebook', 'Twitter', not 'Social')
**Responsive Design:** Test alignment on all breakpoints (md/sm/xs) - center on desktop, left on mobile is common pattern
**Icon Limits:** Limit to 5-7 icons for clean design - more icons = visual clutter
**Tooltip Brevity:** Keep tooltipText under 50 characters for quick readability
**Spacing:** Use iconGap for visual breathing room - 8-12px is optimal
**Border Radius:** Consistent iconBRadius across all icons creates cohesive look
**Performance:** Load FontAwesome library once globally - don't load per-block
**SEO:** Add nofollow:'' (empty) for your own profiles, nofollow:'nofollow' for paid/sponsored links
**Mobile Touch:** Ensure iconPadd provides sufficient touch target (minimum 44x44px total) for mobile
**Tooltip Placement:** Use 'top' for footer icons, 'bottom' for header icons to avoid viewport overflow
**Style Consistency:** Stick to one style variant per site for brand consistency
**Color Contrast:** Ensure iconNmlColor contrasts with nmlBG for WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 ratio minimum)
**Link Testing:** Test all linkUrl values before publishing - broken social links hurt credibility
**Image Icons:** For customType='image', use SVG format for crisp rendering at any size
**Animation Balance:** Use subtle tipAnimation ('fade' or 'scale') - avoid distracting effects

accessibilityNotes: **Meaningful Titles:** Each icon's 'title' attribute is read by screen readers - use network names like 'Facebook', 'Twitter', not generic 'Social'
**Link Targets:** External social links should open in new tabs (target:'_blank') for better navigation experience
**Color Contrast:** Ensure iconNmlColor has sufficient contrast with nmlBG (4.5:1 ratio for WCAG AA) for visibility
**Touch Targets:** Minimum 44x44px total size (iconSize + iconPadd) for mobile touch accessibility
**Keyboard Navigation:** Icons are focusable via Tab key by default - test keyboard navigation flow
**Tooltip Accessibility:** Tooltips appear on focus (not just hover) for keyboard users when tipTriggers includes 'focus'
**aria-label:** Consider adding aria-label via custom CSS/JS if title alone doesn't provide enough context
**Focus Indicators:** Ensure visible focus state for keyboard users - consider adding custom focus styles
**Icon-Only vs Icon+Title:** Styles with visible titles (style-1, style-12, style-14, style-15) are more accessible than icon-only
**Screen Reader Testing:** Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver) to verify icon titles are announced correctly
performanceConsiderations: **FontAwesome Loading:** Load FontAwesome library once globally (header/footer) rather than per-block for faster page load
**Icon Limit:** Limit to 5-7 icons per block - more icons increase DOM size and CSS specificity
**Image Icons:** If using customType='image', optimize images (compress, use SVG) before uploading to reduce file size
**SVG vs PNG:** Prefer SVG for imgField images - scales perfectly at any size and smaller file size than PNG
**Lazy Loading:** For image icons below the fold, consider lazy loading with WordPress native loading='lazy' attribute
**Tooltip Library:** Tippy.js (tooltip library) adds ~20KB - only enable tooltips if truly needed
**CSS Animations:** Hover animations (style-6, style-8, style-9, style-11, style-13) use CSS transforms - hardware accelerated, performant
**Shadow Performance:** Box shadows (style-7, style-16) can impact paint performance on low-end devices - use sparingly
**Responsive Images:** If using custom images, provide multiple sizes (@1x, @2x) for retina displays to avoid oversized downloads
**CDN Usage:** Load social network logos from CDN if using custom images for faster global delivery
integrationPatterns: **Footer Integration:** Place in tp-container > tp-row > tp-column for responsive footer social bar
**Author Bio:** Combine with tp-team-member-list or custom author box for social profile links
**Sidebar Widget:** Use style-12 (horizontal icon+title) in narrow sidebars for compact display
**Header Integration:** Align right in header tp-row with small iconSize (14-16px) for subtle presence
**Popup/Modal:** Include in tp-fancybox popup for social share prompt after content consumption
**Sticky Sidebar:** Place in fixed-position sidebar for always-accessible social following
**Below Content:** Add after blog posts/articles with 'Share this:' heading for social sharing
**Team Member Cards:** Integrate individual team member social links with tp-team-member-list blocks
**Contact Page:** Combine with contact form (tp-form-block) for multiple communication channels
**Newsletter Popup:** Include in newsletter signup popup to offer alternative connection methods (email OR social)
